alert.note: Alert for Adair (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:13PM CDT until May 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 811 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fontanelle, or 6 miles southwest of Greenfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fontanelle and Orient around 820 PM CDT. Nodaway Park around 825 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Greenfield and Greenfield Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
